tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE FleetVehicles (
    vehicle_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    vehicle_name TEXT,
    location_lat DECIMAL,
    location_long DECIMAL,
    gps_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    vehicle_status BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE vehicle_locations (
    location_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    vehicle_id INT,
    latitude DECIMAL(10, 8) NOT NULL,
    longitude DECIMAL(11, 8) NOT NULL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
    CONSTRAINT fk_vehicle_id
        FOREIGN KEY (vehicle_id)
        REFERENCES fleet_vehicles (vehicle_id)
        ON DELETE CASCADE
);

CREATE TABLE vehicle_locations (
    location_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    vehicle_id INT REFERENCES fleet_vehicles(vehicle_id),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    latitude DECIMAL,
    longitude DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE vehicles (
    vehicle_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vehicle_name VARCHAR(50),
    vehicle_type VARCHAR(20),
    location_lat FLOAT,
    location_long FLOAT,
    status VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE drivers (
    driver_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    driver_name VARCHAR(50),
    contact_number VARCHAR(15),
    license_number VARCHAR(20),
    vehicle_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (vehicle_id) REFERENCES vehicles(vehicle_id)
)

CREATE TABLE trips (
    trip_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vehicle_id INT,
    driver_id INT,
    start_time TIMESTAMP,
    end_time TIMESTAMP,
    distance FLOAT,
    FOREIGN KEY (vehicle_id) REFERENCES vehicles(vehicle_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (driver_id) REFERENCES drivers(driver_id)
)

CREATE TABLE gps_data (
    data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vehicle_id INT,
    time TIMESTAMP,
    location_lat FLOAT,
    location_long FLOAT,
    FOREIGN KEY (vehicle_id) REFERENCES vehicles(vehicle_id)
)

CREATE TABLE fleet_vehicles (
    vehicle_id VARCHAR PRIMARY KEY,
    vehicle_type VARCHAR,
    current_location VARCHAR,
    status VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE gps_data (
    gps_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    vehicle_id VARCHAR,
    latitude DECIMAL,
    longitude DECIMAL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMPTZ
)

CREATE TABLE vehicle_history (
    history_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    vehicle_id VARCHAR,
    location VARCHAR,
    status VARCHAR,
    event_timestamp TIMESTAMPTZ
)

CREATE TABLE vehicle_types (
    type_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    type_name VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE vehicle_status (
    status_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    status_name VARCHAR
)
